statements: SELECT item_name, quantity FROM kitchen_inventory WHERE quantity > 0
SELECT supplier_name, last_ordered_date FROM kitchen_inventory ORDER BY last_ordered_date DESC
SELECT * FROM kitchen_inventory WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'Supp%'
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity, supplier_name, last_ordered_date FROM kitchen_inventory WHERE quantity < 10
SELECT item_name, supplier_name FROM kitchen_inventory WHERE last_ordered_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30'
SELECT * FROM kitchen_inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY last_ordered_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM kitchen_inventory WHERE supplier_name = 'Supplier A'
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity, supplier_name FROM kitchen_inventory WHERE item_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND quantity < 20 ORDER BY item_name ASC
SELECT item_name, supplier_name, last_ordered_date FROM kitchen_inventory WHERE last_ordered_date >= '2021-01-01' AND last_ordered_date <= '2021-12-31'
SELECT * FROM kitchen_inventory WHERE supplier_name IN ('Supplier B', 'Supplier C') ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM smart_kitchen_appliances;
SELECT appliance_name, quantity_in_stock FROM smart_kitchen_appliances WHERE quantity_in_stock > 0;
SELECT supplier_name, order_date, delivery_date FROM supply_orders WHERE order_date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT appliance_name, appliance_type FROM smart_kitchen_appliances ORDER BY appliance_type DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, SUM(quantity_ordered) AS total_ordered FROM supply_orders GROUP BY supplier_name ORDER BY total_ordered DESC;
SELECT * FROM smart_kitchen_appliances WHERE quantity_in_stock > 0 ORDER BY appliance_name ASC;
SELECT appliance_name, appliance_type, quantity_in_stock FROM smart_kitchen_appliances WHERE quantity_in_stock <= 10;
SELECT supplier_name, order_date, delivery_date FROM supply_orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY delivery_date DESC;

SELECT appliance_name, supplier_name, quantity_ordered FROM smart_kitchen_appliances JOIN supply_orders ON smart_kitchen_appliances.appliance_id = supply_orders.appliance_id WHERE quantity_ordered > 5 ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;

SELECT appliance_name, appliance_type, supplier_name, order_date FROM smart_kitchen_appliances JOIN supply_orders ON smart_kitchen_appliances.appliance_id = supply_orders.appliance_id WHERE quantity_ordered < 3 AND appliance_type = 'Cooktop';
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT appliance_name, stock_quantity FROM inventory WHERE stock_quantity > 0;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_address, contact_person, contact_number FROM suppliers;
SELECT appliance_name, stock_quantity, last_ordered FROM inventory WHERE appliance_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE stock_quantity > 0 ORDER BY appliance_name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT i.appliance_name, i.stock_quantity, o.order_date FROM inventory i JOIN orders o ON i.appliance_id = o.appliance_id WHERE o.status = 'Delivered' ORDER BY o.order_date ASC;

SELECT s.supplier_name, s.supplier_address, o.quantity_ordered FROM suppliers s LEFT JOIN orders o ON s.supplier_id = o.appliance_id WHERE o.quantity_ordered > 5 ORDER BY s.supplier_name ASC, o.quantity_ordered DESC;

SELECT i.appliance_name, i.stock_quantity, s.supplier_name FROM inventory i JOIN suppliers s ON i.appliance_id = s.supplier_id WHERE i.stock_quantity < 10 OR s.supplier_name LIKE '%ELECT%' ORDER BY i.stock_quantity ASC, s.supplier_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' AND status = 'Pending' ORDER BY order_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM appliances
SELECT appliance_name, quantity FROM appliances ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_location = 'New York'
SELECT appliance_name, quantity FROM stock INNER JOIN appliances ON stock.appliance_id = appliances.appliance_id
SELECT appliance_type, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM appliances GROUP BY appliance_type
SELECT * FROM appliances WHERE quantity > 5 ORDER BY appliance_name DESC
SELECT appliance_name, quantity FROM appliances INNER JOIN stock ON appliances.appliance_id = stock.appliance_id WHERE stock.quantity > 10
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location, COUNT(supplier_id) AS supplier_count FROM suppliers GROUP BY supplier_name, supplier_location ORDER BY supplier_count DESC
SELECT appliance_name, appliance_type, quantity FROM appliances WHERE quantity > 0 AND quantity < 10

SELECT orders.order_id, orders.order_date, suppliers.supplier_name, appliances.appliance_name FROM orders INNER JOIN suppliers ON orders.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id INNER JOIN appliances ON orders.appliance_id = appliances.appliance_id
SELECT * FROM smart_kitchen_appliances WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY last_order_date DESC
SELECT appliance_name, manufacturer_name FROM smart_kitchen_appliances WHERE manufacturer_name = 'Samsung'
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number, email FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE status = 'pending' LIMIT 5
SELECT category_name, description FROM appliance_categories
SELECT * FROM smart_kitchen_appliances WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY last_order_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number, email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT appliance_name, quantity, manufacturer_name FROM smart_kitchen_appliances WHERE manufacturer_name IN ('Samsung', 'LG') ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT order_date, total_cost, status FROM orders WHERE total_cost > 1000 ORDER BY order_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT order_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity, SUM(quantity * unit_price) AS total_cost FROM order_items GROUP BY order_id HAVING total_quantity > 5 ORDER BY total_cost DESC LIMIT 5;
